title: What could collection agency do to F1 student with unpaid medical bills?
question: A student got seriously ill and was admitted to Emergency.
question_tags: Student visas,F-1 visa for students,Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Lawsuits and disputes
answers: If the collection agency has tried to reach you to collect the payment, you should contact an attorney to help you out. You may be able to pay in installments or settle in one lump sum payment for less.

The collection agency can attempt to collect the money owed in any legal manner including lawsuits. This student should contact an experienced civil litigation/debt attorney to discuss options and defenses.

Collection agency could do what their name implies, try to collect. Whether they sue or how they try to collect, or when, is up to them as long as they don't engage in prohibited practices. You should consult a civil law attorney.
